page.title: 17EVENTS
page.content: AN{ANNUAL SCHOOL TRIP}TO THE STATELY HOME OF LORD BATH AT LONGLEAT HOUSE ON THE 4TH JULY 1985 BY CLASSES 1 AND 2 OF WYESHAM JUNIOR SCHOOL. It was funny when David fell asleep on {the bus. }He fell off the seat and banged his head but he was still asleep when we got there. Mr.Bagwell had to pickhim up and put him on the seat. While the bus went round the {Safari Park}it was very hot because we had to have all the windows closed, otherwise the monkeys would get in. One of the monkeys scared me because it shot on the roof of the bus. Afterwards we all went on a boat trip and bought some fish to give to the sealions. We saw many different animals. I took photographs of them. Then we went{off on our own.}We enjoyed getting lost in the maze best of all.
